metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9650 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: CRLF injection vulnerability in the management plugin in RabbitMQ 2.1.0 through 3.4.x before 3.4.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks via the download parameter to api/definitions.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
